name: Soy Sesame Marinade for Salmon
ingredients: 3/4 cups soy sauce and rice wine vinegar
Pineapple soy: 12 oz. pineapple juice concentrate 3 Tbsp soy sauce1 tsp ginger
Orange Pepper: 12 oz. orange juice concentrate1 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes
instructions: Grill or broil it depends on the thickness as to how long it takes.
You can also bake it at 400 for 30 minutes.
